explains: adj. <旧>愉快的，高兴的；<旧>令人愉快的；<英，非正式>微醉的
wordGroup: make merry 作乐；尽情欢乐

sentences.en: She was humming a merry little tune.
sentences.cn: 她轻轻地哼着一首欢快的小曲儿。

sentences.en: From the house come bursts of merry laughter.
sentences.cn: 从房子里传出阵阵欢快的笑声。

sentences.en: A merry crowd of villagers watched the proceedings.
sentences.cn: 一群兴高采烈的村民观看了仪式。
